title: DPI's Runa Alam: Africa's Growth Should Outpace Asia in '26
description: Runa Alam, co-founder and CEO of Development Partners International, says Africa’s growth will exceed Asia’s this year. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that a weaker dollar is making African investments more attractive. (Source: Bloomberg)
